resources.string: HighlightTextView es un componente para Android que permite resaltar palabras. También permite añadir eventos a esas palabras.
Example 1. HighlightTextView from xml with minimum configuration.
Example 2. HighlightTextView from xml with full configuration.
Example 3. Highlight with two words (htv_limit) from start paragraph (htv_start_position_occurrence).
Example 4. Highlight default words (without htv_limit) from start paragraph (htv_start_position_occurrence).
Example 5. Highlight default words (without htv_limit) from second occurrence (htv_start_position_occurrence).
Example 6. Set style in highlight word (htv_highlight_style).
Example 8. HighlightTextView build programmatically with minimum configuration.
Example 9. HighlightTextView build programmatically with full configuration.
Example 10. HighlightTextView build programmatically with click event.
